Package jeco.core.operator.reduction

Class ReductionOperator<T extends Variable<?>>

java.lang.Object
jeco.core.operator.reduction.ReductionOperator<T>
public class ReductionOperator<T extends Variable<?>> extends Object
ReductionOperator removes replacementSize Individuals from the population
Author:
José L. Risco-Martín
